price: Monyε sotie ma Nyankopͻn, na monyε sotie nso ma Ɔsomafoͻ no; na mmom sε modane mo ho (firi nokorε no ho a), Y’asomafoͻ no asεdeε ara ne sε wͻbεbͻ asεm no ho dawuro akyerεkyerε mu.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaytum fa-innamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
